FRAMEWORK FOR MATERNAL HEALTH SERVICES
The Community Health Officer as envisaged in AYUSHMAN BHARAT is the nodal person for the Health and 
Wellness Centre and they will be working as ambassadors of Ayushman Bharat. The essential outputs for the 
Community Health officer for the maternal health programme will be as under
